name: Từ vựng các hoạt động và hành động trong thể thao (Sports Actions and Activities)

words.example: They love to play soccer on weekends.
The basketball game was very exciting.
She won the tennis match easily.
Athletes from many countries will compete in the Olympics.
Our team hopes to win the championship.
It's hard to lose a close game.
He managed to score a goal in the last minute.
Regular exercise is important for health.
The athletes train every day for the competition.
She needs to practice her piano every day.
